Build ID: tptpaide-2007-04-10-00-02-48

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Created new MRT i,e new_file.mrt and added WSDM Resource capabilities and also notificationproducer capability, saved the new_file.mrt
2.Generate code from new_file.mrt file
3.When deploying the generated code in tomcat below error throws up in console view

Delete the generated Java files, so that deployment works fine
Verified - fixed
